Class View

java.lang.Object
view.View
public class View extends Object
The View class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for the Blackjack game. It handles the display of the game window, player actions, and updates to the game state.
Version:
1.0.0.
Author:
ptrzgal

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    View(Game game, Player player, Deck deck, Deck discarded)
    Constructs the View object and initializes the graphical interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    initializeCards()
    Initializes the card labels for both the player and dealer, setting them to face down and adding them to their respective panels.
    void
    printDealerFirstHand(Dealer dealer)
    Displays the dealer's first hand, with the second card face down and the rest of the cards visible.
    void
    printDealerHand(Dealer dealer)
    Displays all the dealer's cards, updating their images based on the current state of the dealer's hand.

    void
    updateFirstDealerHand()
    Updates the dealer's hand value display to show "?" indicating that one of the dealer's cards is face down.
    void

    Updates the player screen with the current game state.

    updateScore(Game game)
    Updates the score display with the current number of wins, losses, and pushes.

  • Constructor Details

    • View

      public View(Game game, Player player, Deck deck, Deck discarded)
      Constructs the View object and initializes the graphical interface.
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance controlling the flow of the game
      player - the player participating in the game
      deck - the deck of cards being used in the game
      discarded - the deck of discarded cards

    • updateFirstDealerHand

      public void updateFirstDealerHand()
